reviewText: My eye problem is too far gone. The book is a waste of time for me.
The exercises are great. I love working my eye muscles.

I purchased this program years back in 1992 when it was offered only on VHS.  At that time I was restricted to wearing glasses while driving on my driver's license.  After the fact of having this restriction, I purchased this program and the next time I went in to have my eyes examined for my drivers license the restriction was lifted!  It just doesn't get any better than that.  Since 1991 I have not had to have any correction on my glasses.  My optometrist is amazed and impressed.  One thing though, as with any muscle building program a person will have to go back and repeat the program from time to time to reestablish the eye muscle strength.  cc
I originally bought this back in the 90's. It was on 6 VHS tapes and cost over $100. The fact that it's now on DVD for a fraction of the price makes it well worth the investment!
